title: Day one VI
content: Family reunions are a peculiar thing. You love those people, but they drive you crazy with their indecisiveness, their constant negativity and worrying. You sometimes wonder how the people you stem from can be so utterly different to yourself. Or is it the reason you are, compared to them? A one hundred percent the opposite way, and it drives you mad. All you would take as normal and given they are contrary to. Family reunions are a peculiar thing. You love those people, even though they drive you crazy. And spending time with your brother for the first time since a very very long time is a wonderful thing. Advertisements
